医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
野生动物与人类交叉的可能性加剧了人们对慢性消耗性疾病的担忧每年秋天，北美各地数以百万计的猎人都会进入森林和草原猎杀鹿。冬天，人们会吃鹿肉排、香肠和用动物制成的汉堡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Possibility-of-wildlife-to- human-crossover-heightens-concern-about-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Possibility-of-wildlife-to- human-crossover-heightens-concern-about-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092941c8-51c3-4b46-9c69-009610ad5955 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:32:32 -0500 Possibility of wildlife-to-human crossover heightens concern about chronic wasting disease
科罗拉多州法律解决方案将提高跨性别女囚犯的护理和住房标准塔莉娅·墨菲 (Taliyah Murphy) 于 2018 年初收到一封信，内容涉及一项即将提起的集体诉讼，该诉讼代表像她这样被关押在科罗拉多州男子监狱的​​跨性别女性提起。这给了她希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Colorado-legal-settlement-would-up-care-and-housing-standards-for-trans-women-inmates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Colorado-legal-settlement-would-up-care-and-housing-standards-for-trans-women-inmates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b33cc1a-bdb1-4646-b14c-19279ef9e2c3 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:31:23 -0500 Colorado legal settlement would up care and housing standards for trans women inmates

研究称父母可能会给幼儿过量使用含氟牙膏剂量，导致氟斑牙的风险研究发现，父母给孩子使用含氟牙膏的剂量明显过量，这表明应改用不含氟的替代品，以防止过度消费和潜在的氟中毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-says-parents-may-overshoot-fluide-toothpaste-dose-for-toddlers-risking-dental-flusis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Study-says-parents-may-overshoot-fluide-toothpaste-dose-for-toddlers-risking-dental-flusis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=216554eb-8321-4555-b0a5-07dab5cdad4c Thu, 01 Feb 2024 23:40:00 -0500 Study says parents may overshoot fluoride toothpaste dose for toddlers, risking dental fluorosis
学海追寻心路：浪漫爱情潮流演变研究研究回顾了浪漫爱情和关系研究的趋势，强调了学术焦点的演变及其对旨在加强家庭关系和社会复原力的政策制定的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Tracing-the-hearts-journey-through-scholarly-seas-A-study-on-the-evolving-tides-of-romantic-love.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Tracing-the-hearts-journey-through-scholarly-seas-A-study-on-the-evolving-tides-of-romantic-love.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7f74b75-0d45-4f0a-85cd-3ff4cb8e4f4a Thu, 01 Feb 2024 23:21:00 -0500 Tracing the heart's journey through scholarly seas: A study on the evolving tides of romantic love

自我监控和激励如何促进在线减肥成功研究表明，参与在线团体干预的中国成年人成功减肥与高动机、定期自我监控和详细的进度日志相关，强调了坚持和动机的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/How-self-monitoring-and-motivation-fuel-online-weight-loss-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/How-self-monitoring-and-motivation-fuel-online-weight-loss-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=603dc2da-5ec7-4605-b7e4-17d4971059cc Thu, 01 Feb 2024 21:21:00 -0500 How self-monitoring and motivation fuel online weight loss success
比较围手术期差异：袖状胃切除术与 Roux-en-Y 胃绕道术研究比较了肥胖患者的腹腔镜袖状胃切除术 (SG) 和 Roux-en-Y 胃绕道术 (RYGB)，发现这两种手术的围手术期风险和并发症均较低且相当，这对两种手术的选择标准提出了挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Comparing-perioperative-differences-Sleeve-gastrection-vs-Roux-en-Y-gastric-bypass.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/Comparing-perioperative-differences-Sleeve-gastrection-vs-Roux-en-Y-gastric-bypass.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5974fb20-bc3d-47c7-a00c-68814a5b69ef Thu, 01 Feb 2024 21:12:00 -0500 Comparing perioperative differences: Sleeve gastrectomy vs. Roux-en-Y gastric bypass
母亲皮质醇水平高与意外出生问题有关一项研究表明，一小段头发可以揭示孕妇的压力水平，并且有一天可能有助于警告意外的出生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/High-maternal-cortisol-levels-linked-to-unexpected-birth-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240201/High-maternal-cortisol-levels-linked-to-unexpected-birth-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=669ee881-354b-4b08-b81b-94260472cb9d Thu, 01 Feb 2024 20:13:32 -0500 High maternal cortisol levels linked to unexpected birth problems
